summary: Makes Shadows Deeper, and Boosts Color and Enhances Vibrancy of outdoor Lighting and Effects.
descriptionHtml:
[b] Immersive Contrast Boost [/b]
[i]By Aplestormy[/i] 

[b] Features [/b]
[list]
 [*] No Performance Loss
 [*] Almost doubles game contrast, getting rid of the \"Washed out\" visuals
 [*] Compatible with [i] nearly [/i] every Lighting Mod
 [*] Makes Shadows Deeper, and Boosts Colour
 [*] Doesn\'t change interior lighting
 [*] Enhances Vibrancy of outdoor Lighting and Effects
[/list]

[b] Compatibility [/b]
This mod is compatible with all lighting mods that do not directly change Skyrims
imagespaces. 
[list]
 [*] 100% Compatible and recommended with RCRN 
 [*] 100% Compatible with ENB\'s
 [*] 100% Compatible with Realistic Lighting Overhaul
 [*] 50% Compatible with Climates Of Tamriel - Contrast will not be boosted in new Weather
 [*] [b] NOT COMPATIBLE WITH IMMERSIVE SATURATION BOOST, PICK ONE! [/b]
[/list]

[b] Notes [/b]
The contrast change may appear extreme at first, to lessen the effect, raise
your brightness to fit personal preference.
This mod is not to everyones taste, if you don\'t like the effect, don\'t download!

[b] PUT AT THE BOTTOM OF YOUR LOAD ORDER! [/b]

[b] Mods Used In Screenshots [/b]
[list]
 [*] RCRN Classic
 [*] Towns and Villages Enhanced: Riverwood Redux (Not released)
 [*] WATER
 [*] Moss Rocks
 [*] Bigger Trees
[/list]

Please remember to like and favourite!
author: Aplestormy
